name: Onomatoplay
text:
Can be used on turn 3 and onward. Return 1 "Zubaba", 'Gagaga", "Gogogo", or "Dododo" monster from your hand to the Deck and add 1 "Zubaba", 'Gagaga", "Gogogo", or "Dododo" monster to your hand from the Deck.
This Skill will only activate if you begin the Duel with a Deck that follows the condition below. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
● Your Deck contains 12 or more "Zubaba", 'Gagaga", "Gogogo", or "Dododo" monsters.
● Your Deck contains 2 or more "Utopia" Xyz Monsters and does not contain any Rank 5 or higher monsters except for "Number" or "ZW" monsters.
